articles.author: VANESSA G. SANCHEZ, PHILLIP REESE/KFF Health News, DEVNA BOSE/Associated Press
articles.title: Young gay Latinos see a rising share of new HIV cases, leading to a call for targeted funding - The Associated Press
articles.description: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services is years into an initiative to end the nation’s HIV epidemic by pumping hundreds of millions of dollars annually into certain states, counties and U.S. territories with the highest infection rates. African Amer…
articles.content: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) Four months after seeking asylum in the U.S., Fernando Hermida began coughing and feeling tired. He thought it was a cold. Then sores appeared in his groin and he would soak his … [+12398 chars]
